p: Evaluation of the cytotoxic effect of N. obtusifolia five extracts on HeLa cervical adenocarcinoma cell line showed that the methylene chloride extract has the highest IC 50 value followed by acetone and petroleum ether extracts with IC 50 values of 0.59, 0.9, and 0.96 mg/ml, respectively, while the methanolic extract of N. obtusifolia plant was cytotoxically inactive. However, the methylene chloride extract showed potential cytotoxic activity comparing with the positive control doxorubicin (a potent anticancer drug) which has an IC 50 value of 0.03 mg/ml ( Figure 3).
